author: Special Correspondent
text:
The AIADMK on Wednesday handed over an acceptance letter from its 48 MPs to Chief Minister Jayalalithaa for allocating Rs. one crore each from the MPLADS funds towards the relief and restoration work in the State.

AIADMK’s Parliamentary party leader and Lok Sabha Deputy Speaker M. Thambidurai and two other MPs handed over the acceptance letter to allocate Rs. 48 crore from the MPLADS funds of 48 MPs, to the Chief Minister at the Secretariat, according to an official communication from the State government.

AIADMK general secretary Jayalalithaa had asked her party MPs to allocate Rs. 1 crore from their MPLADS funds towards the relief and restoration work. The Centre had declared the torrential rains as ‘Calamity of Severe Nature’ enabling MPs to allocate funds from MPLAD for restoration work.
title: AIADMK MPs donate Rs. 1 crore each to relief work
